channel.title: Genuine Dragon
channel.description:
[center][b]Genuine Dragon.[/b][/center] This picture,i was saving it up for sometime,well i am going to release it now.And my friends liked it alot. [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/35ib1ht.jpg[/img]
I had some trouble fixing the angels.
Thank you for your time.

item.title: Genuine Dragon
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Well for one, the shadow on her back that you’re referring to as from the dragon’s wing, is NOT from the dragons wing.

Otherwise the wing would come more at us, and engulf more of her and cover the staff.

What techniques did you use for this?

Read full topic

item.title: Genuine Dragon
item.dc:creator: @supernovadelta supernovadelta
item.description:
@supernovadelta wrote:

The original one was made by one of my good friend,when i got the image there was nothing on the young ladies butt.So i fixed it with a dragon,and the staff i also made it sparkle a little.The shadow of the dragons wings was created by my friend and me.I designed the color,and he designed the shape.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2008, 03:30:27 AM[/size][hr]My friend has the original picture of the whole scene,i’l try to upload that and show you how the picture looked when it was not edited.

Read full topic
